definitions.definition: The world, considered as lacking in purpose , design , or predictability .
The hypothetical group of all the possible universes in existence.
examples: Our universe is a very small part of the multiverse .

definitions.definition: The different canons , continuities or timelines of a fictional property, considered as a whole.
examples: In the DC multiverse , our reality is called "Earth-33". But in the Marvel multiverse , it's "Earth-1218".

main_definition: ( philosophy ) The world, considered as lacking in purpose , design , or predictability .
secondary_definitions: ( physics , cosmology ) The hypothetical group of all the possible universes in existence.
( fiction ) The different canons , continuities or timelines of a fictional property, considered as a whole.
